numbered_ace_sentences: 1. I notice a player-to-coach ratio for people of color.
2. This ratio is significantly in favor of players of color.
3. MLB has the lowest percentage of players of color.
4. NFL has the lowest percentage of coaches of color.
5. I wonder how these percentages compare to the general population.
6. I wonder why the percentage of coaches of color is significantly low.
7. I think that this situation impacts our communities in a good way.
8. I think that this situation shows that diversity in sports is growing.
9. In most sports, players of color are a majority.
10. In NBA, 83% of players are people of color.
12. This situation shows that people of color get fewer higher management positions.
13. This situation has a bad impact on our community.
14. The title is: Behind the screen.
15. The title is also: Is it really diverse in the front office?
